hotels.name: Courtyard McAllen Airport
hotels.description: The hotel is conveniently located only 2 blocks away from the McAllen Airport and directly across the street from La Plaza Mall. With a wide variety of restaurants nearby your dining options are endless.
hotels.amenities: Free high-speed internet, Meeting event space, Pool, Parking, Airport Shuttle

hotels.name: Fairfield Inn & Suites McAllen Airport
hotels.description: Conveniently located 5 minutes from Mcallen International Airport and across the street from a major mall. Also within 15 minutes of the Hidalgo International Bridge into Reynosa, Mexico. Within walking distance of a variety of restaurants.
hotels.amenities: Free high-speed internet, Free breakfast, Pool, Fitness center, Parking, Airport Shuttle

hotels.name: Aloft McAllen
hotels.description: Our hotel is in prime location within walking distance to the McAllen Convention Center, making it ideal for business travelers attending conferences and events. Situated in the Palms Crossing Shopping District.
hotels.amenities: Free high-speed internet, Meeting event space, Pool, Parking, Fitness center, Airport shuttle

hotels.name: Courtyard Hickory
hotels.description: Located off Interstate 40 at exit 125. Turn left onto 13th Ave Dr SE at Outback Steakhouse. Hotel on right behind Carrabba's.
hotels.location: 1946 13th Avenue Drive SEHickory, North Carolina, USA, 28602
